name: Pb138---kartoteka
body:
### PB138 - Kartoteka.

This is a school project for Video management. Video titles are maintained inside ODF database.

### Project requirements:
* To add a categoty
* To add a film to category
* To delete film from category
* To delete empty category
* To change movie category
* To load and save the database to ODF database
* To find movie inside database

### Project links:
* [WIKI](https://github.com/wermington/PB138---Kartoteka/wiki)
* [Repository](https://github.com/wermington/PB138---Kartoteka)


### Design
[UML - Wiki Design](https://github.com/wermington/PB138---Kartoteka/wiki/Design)


### Authors

* Dominik Labuda
* Peter Stanko @wermington
* Peter Zaoral
